questions.question: When a vehicle moves on the road, the resonant frequency depends on:

answers.a: Mass, stiffness of the spring, speed
answers.c: Speed of the vehicle and the stiffness of the suspension spring

explanations.a: Resonance depends on mass and stiffness
explanations.b: In forced vibrations the system is periodically excited

questions.question: It is not safe to operate a machine:

explanations.a: It is safe to operate below natural frequency
explanations.b: It is safe to operate above natural frequency
explanations.c: Since the amplitude is maximum at natural frequency, it is not safe to operate

questions.question: For free vibration, at t=0 deflection of cantilever beam is

explanations.a: At t=0, the beam wont be at rest
explanations.c: It reaches minimum deflection before all eneregy is lost

questions.question: For an undamped system, the amplitude does not change with time

explanations.a: Theoretically, since there is no energy loss, the amplitude does not change with time

questions.question: A forging system should have a heavy base:

answers.a: To shift natural frequency from excitation frequency
answers.b: As all modes are excited from the impact
answers.c: If not the final workpiece will deform

explanations.a: If impact force and the first natural frequency matches, the billet will break
explanations.b: Increased stifness will ensure a considerable shift in natural frequency
explanations.c: Deformation should be to a minimum, when in a forge
explanations.d: All the above factors contribute for having a heavy base
